department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
full_summary:
### Cancelled Tender Notice
#### Reference Number: PW-23-01021341

The following tender notice has been cancelled:
#### English Version

Notice Title: Cancelled-23-230904

Amendment Number: 0 (no amendments)

Publication Date: January 13, 2023

Tender Closing Date: January 30, 2023 at 13:00:00

Effective Date of this cancellation: TBA

**Tender Status:** Cancelled.

#### French Version

Titre de l'avis: Annulé-23-230904

Numéro de modification: 0 (aucune modification)

Date de publication: 13 janvier 2023

Date de clôture des offres: 30 janvier 2023, à 13 heures 00 minutes

Date d'entrée en vigueur de cette annulation : à déterminer

**Statut de l'appel d'offres:** Annulé.

### Tender Contract Information

* Category: Service (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Bidder Selection Criteria: None
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Entity: Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Department of)

* Operating Address: 125 Sussex Drive Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G2
* Contact Email: Steve Whiteduck (steve.whiteduck@international.gc.ca)

### Warning to Potential Bidders

This tender notice is now cancelled and no longer open for bidding. All potential bidders are hereby informed that they should not submit any bids for this cancelled notice.

The cancellation is final and there are no amendments to be made. Any future inquiry or questions should be addressed to Steve Whiteduck at (steve.whiteduck@international.gc.ca).

[The official documents for this project will be available through the Bidders Library under PW-23-01021341]
